title: A Country Romance
description: I never wanted to go through the heartache of being betrayed again. Not after my best friend and my girl decided they wanted to be together. I thought that all woman were the same. They just wanted me for my money and fame. I'm the CEO of Ashford Hotels and Casinos.I never expected the wind would get knocked right out of me by a woman at my best friend's and ex girl's wedding.Too bad because as soon as she figures out the real reason I showed up, she'll never give me the time of day.Problem is, she has a way of getting under my skin. I can't let that happen, but I'm starting to think I may not have a choice. Sheâ€™s starting to make my cold heart thaw.Can I allow her to chip away at my fears? Or should I push away the chance at true love and avoid the heartbreak and pain it brings with it?
author: Anneke Boshoff
